overview: Comedy mockumentary film. A group of documentary filmmakers is making a film about the life of people during the war in the city of Brovary (Kyiv region, Ukraine). Unexpectedly, they manage to shoot material about a real hero with superpowers.

production_companies.name: Kyiv National I. K. Karpenko-Karyi Theatre, Cinema and Television University

title: Captain Brovary
